name: street_level_outcomes
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool data_police_uk.
Tool description: This is the unofficial documentation for the Data.Police.UK API.
API description: Fetches street-level outcomes such as crime data for a given location, either at a specific point, within a 1-mile radius, or within a custom area for a specified date.

date.description: The date for which to fetch outcomes, formatted as 'YYYY-MM'.

lat.description: The latitude of the specific location.

lng.description: The longitude of the specific location.
